samples.question: And Young Joon, are you working or are you a student?
samples.transcript: I am a student right now and, I am actually, planning to go to school, start a new semester in March as a senior. And.

samples.question: So do you live in a house or an apartment?

samples.question: So, are there many street markets in your country?
samples.transcript: Of course, I think there are many street markets. nowadays compared to, like 10 years ago, 20 years ago, it has, the number of street markets has been reduced. But still, I think there are many compared to other countries like US or England. Especially in Jong-lo, you can find at least, I think, three or four big small street markets. And I think still they are popular enough.
samples.transcript_original: Of course, I think there are many street markets. Um, nowadays compared to, um, like 10 years ago, 20 years ago, it has, the number of street markets has been reduced. And I think still they are popular enough.

And I think still they are popular enough.

samples.question: And what do people usually buy at street markets?
samples.transcript: I think usually it is groceries or food, like street foods as well. So, people, some people have this norm which is they sell more fresh groceries or food than normal supermarkets. So people tend to go there and also you, you can find many street food, delicious street food that you cannot find in other stores. So I think, yeah, that is the reason why people visit there and buy things. Yeah. Great.

samples.question: And, apart from advertisements, what else influences, consumers when they are looking to buy a product?

I think promotion is a little bit different. So where like celebrities, famous like public figures, they, advertise promote this item actually like using and showing the reviews, of the item. yeah, I would say promotion.

samples.question: Yes, and why do some people dislike asking other people for their opinion when making a decision?
samples.transcript: Maybe it is because, maybe it is because they actually decided, like, actually in their mind, They have decided for an option but if they don want to hear anything than that then they will avoid to talking to people to get some help because he or she already decided what to buy or what to do So that can be one reason or maybe he or she is a bit snobbish. So I do not need anyone to help me. I only think the best way. Okay, yes.
samples.transcript_original: Uh, maybe it's because, uh, maybe it's because they actually decided, like, actually in their mind, They have decided for an option but if they don want to hear anything than that then they will avoid to uh talking to people to get some help because he or she already decided what to buy or what to do So that can be one reason or maybe he or she is a bit snobbish. samples.question: Young people, what kind of decisions young people should make?
samples.transcript: I think young people should make decisions on, on future, I think.

samples.question: And are you working or are you a student?
samples.transcript: I was a student right before, like a month ago. I am currently start to work at an academy in Korea which is English for kids aged like 8 to 12. Good.

samples.question: And could you tell me about your hometown?
samples.transcript: I was born and raised in Changwon, where it is situated in the southern part of Korea. And it is located near the beautiful beach.

samples.transcript_cleaned: I was born and raised in Changwon, where it is situated in the southern part of Korea. And it is located near the beautiful beach.

samples.question: And do you think you will live in your hometown in the future?
samples.transcript: I do not think I am going to live in my hometown anymore. it is because I already moved to Seoul for my university. And then I am planning to go abroad again. So I do not think hometown is my future home. And now we are going to talk about shopping.

samples.question: So do you like shopping?
samples.transcript: Yeah, of course definitely. when I am getting stressed, I usually go for, go shopping. And even if I do not buy anything, going shopping makes me feel better. Yeah.

samples.question: And do you like to compare prices when you shop?
